title: Should I take notes on my phone or on my laptop, and why? - Quora

response.answer_text: Take notes on a laptop or a journal. Evernote is great for sorting, organising, and taking notes! You can sort them into lessons and the individual lectures! However, I think it is always better to use a pen and notepad because you can easily express yourself and how you are thinking on paper, whereas on a screen it is much harder to make notes or shorten sentences. By taking notes, it shows that you are taking that information in, processing it, and then putting it in your own words and this increases retention by a far greater amount than just voice recording it, for example! I try and help a lot of students in my blogs, read more here on www.student-it.com
